price: Mbega ukuntu (abahakanyi) ku munsi bazaza batugana, bazaba babona bakanumva neza! Ariko uyu munsi inkozi z’ibibi ziri mu buyobe bugaragara.
arabic: أَسۡمِعۡ بِهِمۡ وَأَبۡصِرۡ يَوۡمَ يَأۡتُونَنَا لَٰكِنِ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: asmiʿ bihim wa-abṣir yawma yatūnanā lākini al-ẓālimūna al-yawma fī ḍalālin mubīnin
